alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Yakutat (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 22 at 9:38PM AKST until December 24 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SIGNIFICANT SNOWFALL FOR PARTS OF SE AK THROUGH CHRISTMAS... .Multiple bands of precip will pass over the panhandle through the weekend and bring significant snowfall. This evening, we are starting to see light snow being reported in the southern panhandle and we expect this to become more widespread and slowly spread north through the morning hours. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM FRIDAY TO 9 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph in localized areas. * WHERE...City and Borough of Yakutat. * WHEN...From 6 PM Friday to 9 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow will begin early Friday evening with rates increasing after midnight.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
